prompts: Create a playful and chubby Pokemon that loves to eat and sleep.
Imagine a small, blue creature with a big appetite and a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a cuddly bear and enjoys lounging in sunny spots.
Generate a round Pokemon with a joyful expression and a love for berry picking.
Show me a lazy Pokemon that nibbles on grass and takes long naps in the forest.
Give me a cute, food-loving Pokemon that has a soft, fluffy body.
Make a Pokemon with a big smile and a penchant for snacking on everything.
